channel.title: Port changing
channel.description: i know what you may be thinking wow this guy is stupid well im not and i need to change my port from 43594 to 5555 i went through my client.java and changed to port 5555 from 43594 and it still connects to 43594 not 5555 the reason i need this done is because im making a world 2 for my players so please help me and explain another way i can change port or where... btw this is delta if that helps any

item.title: Port changing
item.dc:creator: @pokemonn pokemonn
item.description:
@pokemonn wrote:

That did not help on my client login it shows username password ip and port I can’t edit from my client directly ip and port so it’s in files and I just can’t change it I put in search bar (of files) 43594 which it says on client display and there all changed to 5555 any ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: Port changing
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

You also need to edit your server to synchronize the ports.

Read full topic
